name: Short Inca Trail 2 Days / 1 Night
description: If you are short on time (or energy) you can still enjoy the highlights of the Inca Trail in this amazing 2 day trek. You will visit the most beautiful site on the Inca Trail, the Inca ruins of Wiñay Wayna, and visit Machu Picchu twice! Once in the evening in time to witness the sunset and again early the next morning for the sunrise.
